constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 120 (Friday, July 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. FLETCHER:
H.R. 4381.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H3617]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Climate Change.

title: To direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to issue guidance on minimizing the use of firefighting foam containing PFAS, and for other purposes.
